summary: "Mr. Bean" is a British comedy TV show created by Rowan Atkinson and Richard Curtis. It stars Atkinson as Mr. Bean, a grown man with a child's mindset, who faces everyday problems in funny ways. The series has 15 episodes and was very popular when it aired on ITV from 1990 to 1995. Its physical comedy, inspired by silent film stars, makes it enjoyable even without understanding much dialogue. The show has been sold worldwide and led to an animated version, movies, and appearances by Atkinson as Mr. Bean in other events.
title: Mr. Bean
